title: It's 11:20pm PST. We have 40 Minutes of Pool Party Left.
body:
**Nobody** should be Solo Queueing. Join the 'Pool Party' chat room and invite spam invites.

http://i.gyazo.com/5ce227d5a0133701eddc2b6791ca1328.png

ARAM GAMES ONLY AT THIS POINT. NORMAL GAMES MIGHT NOT FINISH IN TIME.

replies.body: 1 game really wasn't enough for this event. Even if you did your 1 win from a 5-man premade, the rewards are lacklustre unless they all get unlocked.

1 game is enough for me

I'm gonna get all the rewards that have been awarded so far so why should I continue to participate when I don't want to? It's not like I'm gonna make a world of difference by myself if I decided to play more.

I'll now redirect you to [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/Hap05wfv-riot-next-time-you-make-an-event-like-this-you-need-to-increase-the-threshold-for-contributions), scumbag. You don't deserve any rewards and neither does anyone else with this kind of mentality.

Ah, if they increased the point thresh-hold then of course I'm gonna play more, but only what I need. I've really only been playing this game for custom games with friends lately anyway, I don't feel like playing normal matches for awhile (at least for the time being). I'm busy with other games and real-world stuff.

Please think twice about someone's situation/decision before calling them scumbags :)

If everyone thinks "i cant make any difference" then no one would get any points, but if everyone in the world thinks "okay just one more game" then thats several million more points for everyone 

but if you dont want to participate like you say then thats fair enough no one can force you, team games aren't for everyone.
Back to the ol' solo queue because I have no friends :(
A free champ, free ip, free icons, sales. for what? playing the game? *Lackluster* my fucking ass
Solo queue > whatever pool party is for
